English: agnosticism, the philosophical doctrine that some questions about the universe are in principle unanswerable

d.f: `一~`種~`唯~`心~`的~`認識論~。`認為~`除~`了~`感覺~`之外~`的~`世界~`是~`無法~`認識~`的~。

English: agnosticism, the philosophical doctrine that some questions about the universe are in principle unanswerable
